SEARCH
Package Tree

Class Tree

java.lang.Object
Tree.Tree
public class Tree extends Object
Represents a tree data structure for modeling a planetary system. Each node in the tree represents a celestial body (Star, Planet, or Satellite).

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    Tree.Node
    Represents a node (Star, Planet, or Satellite) in the planetary system.

      public Tree.Node root

  • Constructor Details

    • Tree

      public Tree()
      Constructor to initialize the tree with a null root node.

  • Method Details

    • createPlanetSystem

      public void createPlanetSystem(String name, double temp, double pressure, double humidity, double radiation)
      Creates a planetary system with a star as the root node.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the star.
      temp - The temperature of the star.
      pressure - The pressure of the star.
      humidity - The humidity of the star (must be 0).
      radiation - The radiation level of the star.

    • addPlanet

      public boolean addPlanet(String name, String parentName, double temp, double pressure, double humidity, double radiation)
      Adds a planet node under a parent node.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the planet.
      parentName - The name of the parent node (either star or planet).
      temp - The temperature of the planet.
      pressure - The pressure of the planet.
      humidity - The humidity of the planet.
      radiation - The radiation level of the planet.
      Returns:
      True if the planet is added successfully.

    • addSatellite

      public boolean addSatellite(String name, String parentName, double temp, double pressure, double humidity, double radiation)
      Adds a satellite node under a planet node.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the satellite.
      parentName - The name of the planet node.
      temp - The temperature of the satellite.
      pressure - The pressure of the satellite.
      humidity - The humidity of the satellite.
      radiation - The radiation level of the satellite.
      Returns:
      True if the satellite is added successfully.

    • findElement

      public Tree.Node findElement(String name)
      Finds an element (node) by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the node to search for.
      Returns:
      The node if found, otherwise null.

    • findRadiationAnomalies

      public List<Tree.Node> findRadiationAnomalies(Tree.Node root, double threshold)
      Finds nodes with radiation levels above the given threshold.
      Parameters:
      root - The root node to start searching from.
      threshold - The radiation threshold.
      Returns:
      A list of nodes with radiation levels above the threshold.

    • getPathTo

      public Stack<Tree.Node> getPathTo(String name)
      Finds the path to a node by its name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the node.
      Returns:
      A stack representing the path from the root to the node.

    • printMissionReport

      public void printMissionReport(Tree.Node root)
      Prints the mission report for the entire planetary system.
      Parameters:
      root - The root node of the system.

    • printMissionReportNode

      public boolean printMissionReportNode(Tree.Node root, String name)
      Prints the mission report for a specific node by its name.
      Parameters:
      root - The root node of the system.
      name - The name of the node to print the report for.
      Returns:
      True if the report for the node is printed, otherwise false.
